ðŸ“– Summary: Wild is a linker aiming for speed in iterative development, currently supporting x86-64 Linux. It produces various binary types and works with Rust proc-macros, although incremental linking and broader support are planned for the future. It's intended as a faster alternative to other linkers during the development process.
